title: The "503 Service Temporarily Unavailable" error occurs when clicking Virtual Agent Settings
content:
When you click Virtual Agent Settings in Suite Administration, the "503 Service Temporarily Unavailable" error occurs.

Cause

A possible cause for this issue is that the virtual agent pods aren't up. 

Solution

Check if the following virtual agent pods are running. If not, bring the pods up one by one:

  • virtual-agent-admin-ui
  • virtual-agent-nlu
  • virtual-agent-bot-engine

For more information, see Smart virtual agent settings.
